datasets.name: SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam monthly sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of monthly mean sea ice concentration at 25km spatial resolution. Available from 1-Oct-1978 to present.

datasets.name: SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam daily sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 25km spatial resolution. Available from 26-Oct-1978 to present.
datasets._comment: data arranged in yearly folders. No option yet to retrieve only a subset of years

datasets.name: SMMR SSM/I Nasateam near-real-time sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 25km spatial resolution. Provides recent but not-quality-checked updates to the SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam daily data.
datasets._comment: this uses custom method, files need to go into yearly subdirectories

datasets.name: IFREMER SSM/I daily sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 12.5km spatial resolution. Available from 3-Dec-1991 to present.

datasets.name: SMMR SSM/I Nasateam near-real-time sea ice concentration (North)
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 25km spatial resolution. Provides recent but not-quality-checked updates to the SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam daily data.
datasets._comment: this uses custom method, files need to go into yearly subdirectories
